ST04-001.name: Kaido ST04-001
ST04-001.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −7 Trash up to 1 of your opponent's Life cards.

ST04-002.name: Ulti ST04-002
ST04-002.effect: [On Play] DON!! −1 Play up to 1 [Page One] card with a cost of 4 or less from your hand.

ST04-003.name: Kaido ST04-003
ST04-003.effect: [On Play] DON!! −5 K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less. This Character gains [Rush] during this turn.

ST04-004.name: King ST04-004
ST04-004.effect: [On Play] DON!! −1 K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

ST04-005.name: Queen ST04-005
ST04-005.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] DON!! −1 Draw 2 cards and trash 1 card from your hand.

ST04-008.name: Jack ST04-008
ST04-008.effect: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

ST04-010.name: Who's-Who ST04-010
ST04-010.effect: [On Play] DON!! −1 K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less. [Trigger] Play this card.

ST04-014.name: Lead Performer 'Disaster' ST04-014
ST04-014.effect: [Main] Draw 1 card, then add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

ST04-015.name: Brachio Bomber ST04-015
ST04-015.effect: [Main] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less, then add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active. [Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

ST04-016.name: Blast Breath ST04-016
ST04-016.effect: [Counter] DON!! −1 Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.

ST04-017.name: Onigashima Island ST04-017
ST04-017.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Stage: If your Leader has the {Animal Kingdom Pirates} type, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.
